remarks: The predicate "is an atom".  ( ~ ela analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 18-Sep-2011.)
statement:
isatom.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
isatom.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
isatom.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
isatom.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
isat $p |- ( K e. D -> ( P e. A <-> ( P e. B /\ .0. C P ) ) ) $.
